name: @neynar/go-sdk
description: SDK to interact with Neynar APIs (https://docs.neynar.com/reference/quickstart)

scripts.generate:api: del-cli api && export GO_POST_PROCESS_FILE='gofmt -w' && openapi-generator-cli generate --enable-post-process-file --git-user-id neynarxyz --git-repo-id go-sdk -i ./oas/src/v2/spec.yaml -g go -o ./api --config ./openapi-generator-config.api.json --openapi-normalizer SIMPLIFY_ONEOF_ANYOF=true && openapi-generator-cli generate --enable-post-process-file --git-user-id neynarxyz --git-repo-id go-sdk -i ./oas/src/v2/spec.yaml -g go -o ./api --config ./openapi-generator-config.api.json --openapi-normalizer SIMPLIFY_ONEOF_ANYOF=false --openapi-normalizer FILTER='operationId:fetch-bulk-users-by-eth-or-sol-address|fetch-subscription-check'
scripts.generate:hub-api: del-cli hub-api && export GO_POST_PROCESS_FILE='gofmt -w' && openapi-generator-cli generate --enable-post-process-file --git-user-id neynarxyz --git-repo-id go-sdk -i ./oas/src/hub-rest-api/spec.yaml -g go -o ./hub-api --config ./openapi-generator-config.hub-api.json

author: Neynar
